class.name: mpandroidchartwrapper.barChartWrapper
class.event: bar_value(val As Float, index As Int)

method.name: clearValues
method.comment: Clears this data object from all DataSets and removes all Entries. Don't forget to invalidate the chart after this.

method.name: setDescriptionPosition
method.comment: Sets a custom position for the description text in pixels on the screen. x: - xcoordinate y: - ycoordinate

method.name: enableScroll
method.comment: enables intercept touchevents

method.name: saveToGallery
method.comment:
Saves the current state of the chart to the gallery as a JPEG image. The filename and compression can be set. 0 == maximum compression, 100 = low compression (high quality). NOTE: Needs permission WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
fileName e.g. "my_image" quality e.g. 50, min = 0, max = 100

method.name: disableScroll
method.comment: disables intercept touchevents

method.name: saveToPath
method.comment:
Saves the current chart state with the given name to the given path on the sdcard leaving the path empty "" will put the saved file directly on the SD card chart is saved as a PNG image, example: saveToPath("myfilename", "foldername1/foldername2");
fileName e.g. "my_image" pathOnSD e.g. "folder1/folder2/folder3"

property.name: YaxisTextColor
property.comment: set Y-Axis text color

property.name: NoOfMarkerDigits
property.comment: set the number of insignificant digits to appear in the markers

property.name: BorderColor
property.comment: Sets the color of the chart border lines.

property.name: DrawBorders
property.comment: Sets drawing the borders rectangle to true. If this is enabled, there is no point drawing the axis-lines of x- and y-axis.

property.name: DrawXaxisGridLines
property.comment: set draw x-axis grid lines

property.name: DragEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable dragging (moving the chart with the finger) for the chart (this does not effect scaling).

property.name: XaxisTextSize
property.comment: set X-Axis text size

property.name: DoubleTapToZoomEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable zooming in by double-tap on the chart. Default: enabled

property.name: ShowYaxisLeftLabels
property.comment: Show or don't show the left Y-Axis labels.

property.name: YaxisTextSize
property.comment: set Y-Axis text size

property.name: GridBackgroundColor
property.comment: Sets the color for the background of the chart-drawing area (everything behind the grid lines).

property.name: DrawHighlightArrow
property.comment: set this to true to draw the highlightning arrow

property.name: MarkerToUse
property.comment: Set the marker (image)to be used. An int value from 1 to 4 See the res/drawable and res/layout folders of the B4A project

property.name: DrawGridBackground
property.comment: set this to true to draw the grid background, false if not

property.name: XaxisTextColor
property.comment: set X-Axis text color

property.name: BorderWidth
property.comment: Sets the width of the border lines in dp.

property.name: XaxisLabelPosition
property.comment: set x-axis label position

property.name: DrawYaxisGridLines
property.comment: set draw y-axis grid lines

property.name: ShowYaxisRightLabels
property.comment: Show or don't show the right Y-Axis labels.

property.name: DrawAxisLine
property.comment: set draw x-axis line

property.name: ChartBitmap
property.comment: Returns the bitmap that represents the chart.

property.name: ScaleEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable scaling (zooming in and out by gesture) for the chart (this does not effect dragging) on both X- and Y-Axis.

property.name: PinchZoom
property.comment: if set to true, both x and y axis can be scaled with 2 fingers, if false, x and y axis can be scaled separately. default: false

property.name: YAxisMaxValue
property.comment: Set a custom maximum value for this axis.

property.name: YAxisMinValue
property.comment: Set a custom minimum value for this axis.

method.name: clearValues
method.comment: Clears this data object from all DataSets and removes all Entries. Don't forget to invalidate the chart after this.

method.name: setDescriptionPosition
method.comment: Sets a custom position for the description text in pixels on the screen. x: - xcoordinate y: - ycoordinate

method.name: enableScroll
method.comment: enables intercept touchevents

method.name: saveToGallery
method.comment:
Saves the current state of the chart to the gallery as a JPEG image. The filename and compression can be set. 0 == maximum compression, 100 = low compression (high quality). NOTE: Needs permission WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
fileName e.g. "my_image" quality e.g. 50, min = 0, max = 100

method.name: disableScroll
method.comment: disables intercept touchevents

method.name: saveToPath
method.comment:
Saves the current chart state with the given name to the given path on the sdcard leaving the path empty "" will put the saved file directly on the SD card chart is saved as a PNG image, example: saveToPath("myfilename", "foldername1/foldername2");
fileName e.g. "my_image" pathOnSD e.g. "folder1/folder2/folder3"

property.name: DecreasingColor
property.comment: THIS DOES NOT WORK FOR STACKED BAR CHARTS set this to true to draw the highlightning arrow

property.comment: if set to true, both x and y axis can be scaled with 2 fingers, if false, x and y axis can be scaled separately. default: false

property.name: BorderColor
property.comment: Sets the color of the chart border lines.

property.name: DrawBorders
property.comment: Sets drawing the borders rectangle to true. If this is enabled, there is no point drawing the axis-lines of x- and y-axis.

property.name: DrawXaxisGridLines
property.comment: set draw x-axis grid lines

property.name: YaxisTextAngle
property.comment: Sets the angle to rotate the Y-axis labels by Suggest rotation of between -30.0 and 30.0 where 0.0 will be no rotation (i.e text horizontal)

property.name: DragEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable dragging (moving the chart with the finger) for the chart (this does not effect scaling).

property.name: DrawMarkerViews
property.comment: Set this to true to draw a user specified marker-view when tapping on chart values (use the setMarkerView(MarkerView mv) method to specify a marker view). Default: true

property.name: XaxisTextSize
property.comment: set X-Axis text size

property.name: RightYaxisTextColor
property.comment: set the right Y-Axis text color

property.name: DoubleTapToZoomEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable zooming in by double-tap on the chart. Default: enabled

property.name: ShowYaxisLeftLabels
property.comment: Show or don't show the left Y-Axis labels.

property.name: DrawLineValues
property.comment: Draw or don't draw line values on the graph.

property.name: YaxisTextSize
property.comment: set Y-Axis text size

property.name: YaxisRightMinVal
property.comment: Set the minimum value for the y axis (Right) If a value is not set then it will be calculated automatically

property.name: GridBackgroundColor
property.comment: Sets the color for the background of the chart-drawing area (everything behind the grid lines).

property.name: DrawCubicGraph
property.comment: Draw or don't draw a cubic line graph.

property.name: MarkerToUse
property.comment: Set the marker (image)to be used. An int value from 1 to 4 See the res/drawable and res/layout folders of the B4A project

property.name: DrawDashedLine
property.comment: Disables the line to be drawn in dashed mode.

property.name: LegendEntrySpace
property.comment: Sets the space between the legend entries on a horizontal axis in pixels, converts to dp internally Default value is 6.0f

property.name: DrawGridBackground
property.comment: set this to true to draw the grid background, false if not

property.name: DrawGraphHollowCircles
property.comment: Draw hollow or solid graph circles.

property.name: XaxisTextColor
property.comment: set X-Axis text color

property.name: YaxisLeftMaxVal
property.comment: Set the maximum value for the y axis (Left) If a value is not set then it will be calculated automatically

property.name: GraphCircleSize
property.comment: Set the size of the graph small circles.

property.name: XaxisLables
property.comment: Set the X-Axis labels.

property.name: BarAxisDependency
property.comment: Sets the axis dependency for the Bar Chart LEFT or RIGHT

property.name: XaxisTextAngle
property.comment: Sets the angle to rotate the X-axis labels by Suggest rotation of between -30.0 and 30.0 where 0.0 will be no rotation (i.e text horizontal)

property.name: BorderWidth
property.comment: Sets the width of the border lines in dp.

property.name: XaxisLabelPosition
property.comment: set x-axis label position

property.name: DrawYaxisGridLines
property.comment: set draw y-axis grid lines

property.name: LineAxisDependency
property.comment: Sets the axis dependency for the Line Chart LEFT or RIGHT

property.name: ShowYaxisRightLabels
property.comment: Show or don't show the right Y-Axis labels.

property.name: DrawAxisLine
property.comment: set draw x-axis line

property.name: ChartBitmap
property.comment: Returns the bitmap that represents the chart.

property.name: GraphLineWidth
property.comment: Set the width of the graph line.

property.name: FillColor
property.comment: Set the color to fill the area between the graph and the X axis with.

property.name: HighlightEnabled
property.comment: If set to true, value highlighting is enabled for all underlying data of the chart which means that all values can be highlighted programmatically or by touch gesture.

property.name: ScaleEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable scaling (zooming in and out by gesture) for the chart (this does not effect dragging) on both X- and Y-Axis.

property.name: DrawBarValues
property.comment: Draw or don't draw bar values on the graph.

property.name: CrossHairColor
property.comment: Set the color of the cross hair that appears when the graph is touched

property.name: CubicIntensity
property.comment: Set the intensity of the cubic line graph. A value from 0.0 to 1.0

property.name: PinchZoom
property.comment: if set to true, both x and y axis can be scaled with 2 fingers, if false, x and y axis can be scaled separately. default: false

property.name: GraphCircleColor
property.comment: Set the color of the graph small circles.

property.name: YaxisRightMaxVal
property.comment: Set the maximum value for the y axis (Right) If a value is not set then it will be calculated automatically

property.name: YaxisLeftMinVal
property.comment: Set the minimum value for the y axis (Left) If a value is not set then it will be calculated automatically

property.name: LeftYaxisTextColor
property.comment: set the left Y-Axis text color

Saves the current state of the chart to the gallery as a JPEG image. The filename and compression can be set. 0 == maximum compression, 100 = low compression (high quality). NOTE: Needs permission WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
fileName e.g. "my_image" quality e.g. 50, min = 0, max = 100

method.name: disableScroll
method.comment: disables intercept touchevents

method.name: saveToPath
method.comment:
Saves the current chart state with the given name to the given path on the sdcard leaving the path empty "" will put the saved file directly on the SD card chart is saved as a PNG image, example: saveToPath("myfilename", "foldername1/foldername2");
fileName e.g. "my_image" pathOnSD e.g. "folder1/folder2/folder3"

property.name: YaxisTextColor
property.comment: set Y-Axis text color

property.name: BorderColor
property.comment: Sets the color of the chart border lines.

property.name: DrawBorders
property.comment: Sets drawing the borders rectangle to true. If this is enabled, there is no point drawing the axis-lines of x- and y-axis.

property.name: DrawXaxisGridLines
property.comment: set draw x-axis grid lines

property.name: DragEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable dragging (moving the chart with the finger) for the chart (this does not effect scaling).

property.name: YaxisMaxVal
property.comment: Set the maximum value for the y axis If a value is not set then it will be calculated automatically

property.name: XaxisTextSize
property.comment: set X-Axis text size

property.name: DoubleTapToZoomEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable zooming in by double-tap on the chart. Default: enabled

property.name: ShowYaxisLeftLabels
property.comment: Show or don't show the left Y-Axis labels.

property.name: YaxisMinVal
property.comment: Set the minimum value for the y axis If a value is not set then it will be calculated automatically

property.name: YaxisTextSize
property.comment: set Y-Axis text size

property.name: GridBackgroundColor
property.comment: Sets the color for the background of the chart-drawing area (everything behind the grid lines).

property.name: DrawGraphValues
property.comment: Draw or don't draw values on the graph.

property.name: MarkerToUse
property.comment: Set the marker (image)to be used. An int value from 1 to 4 See the res/drawable and res/layout folders of the B4A project

property.comment: sets the space between the legend entries on a horizontal axis in pixels, converts to dp internally Default value is 6.0f

property.name: DrawGridBackground
property.comment: set this to true to draw the grid background, false if not

property.comment: set X-Axis text color

property.name: ScaleEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable scaling (zooming in and out by gesture) for the chart (this does not effect dragging) on both X- and Y-Axis.

property.name: PinchZoom
property.comment: if set to true, both x and y axis can be scaled with 2 fingers, if false, x and y axis can be scaled separately. default: false

class.name: mpandroidchartwrapper.multiLineChartWrapper
class.event: value_selected(index As Int, value As Float)

method.name: clearValues
method.comment: Clears this chart from all DataSets and removes all Entries.

method.name: setDescriptionPosition
method.comment: Sets a custom position for the description text in pixels on the screen.

method.name: setLineData
method.comment:
Draw the line chart(s) once all data has been set up Mamimum number of simultaneous line charts is 5 variable numberOfCharts: 1 = draw only the first line chart of all line charts that data has been set up for 2 = draw only line charts 1 and 2 of all line charts that data has been set up for 3 = draw only line charts 1, 2, and 3 of all line charts that data has been set up for
numberOfEntriesPerChart: draw only the first x number of entries for each line chart that data has been set up for eg if data are passed for months of Jan to Dec and numberOfEntriesPerChart = 6 then each line chart will be drawn showing only data for Jan to Jun

method.name: setTheLegendPositionAndForm
method.comment: Set the legend Position and Form Position can be one of the following: "RIGHT_OF_CHART", "RIGHT_OF_CHART_CENTER", "RIGHT_OF_CHART_INSIDE", "LEFT_OF_CHART", "LEFT_OF_CHART_CENTER", "LEFT_OF_CHART_INSIDE", "BELOW_CHART_LEFT", "BELOW_CHART_RIGHT", "BELOW_CHART_CENTER". Form can be one of the following: "SQUARE", "CIRCLE", "LINE"

method.name: enableScroll
method.comment: enables intercept touchevents

method.name: saveToGallery
method.comment:
Saves the current state of the chart to the gallery as a JPEG image. The filename and compression can be set. 0 == maximum compression, 100 = low compression (high quality). NOTE: Needs permission WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
fileName e.g. "my_image" quality e.g. 50, min = 0, max = 100

method.name: disableScroll
method.comment: disables intercept touchevents

method.name: saveToPath
method.comment:
Saves the current chart state with the given name to the given path on the sdcard leaving the path empty "" will put the saved file directly on the SD card chart is saved as a PNG image, example: saveToPath("myfilename", "foldername1/foldername2");
fileName e.g. "my_image" pathOnSD e.g. "folder1/folder2/folder3"

property.name: DrawBorders
property.comment: Sets drawing the borders rectangle to true. If this is enabled, there is no point drawing the axis-lines of x- and y-axis.

property.name: DrawXaxisGridLines
property.comment: set draw x-axis grid lines

property.name: DragEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable dragging (moving the chart with the finger) for the chart (this does not effect scaling).

property.name: YaxisMaxVal
property.comment: Set the maximum value for the y axis If a value is not set then it will be calculated automatically

property.name: XaxisTextSize
property.comment: set X-Axis text size

property.name: DoubleTapToZoomEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable zooming in by double-tap on the chart. Default: enabled

property.name: ShowYaxisLeftLabels
property.comment: Show or don't show the left Y-Axis labels.

property.name: YaxisMinVal
property.comment: Set the minimum value for the y axis If a value is not set then it will be calculated automatically

property.name: YaxisTextSize
property.comment: set Y-Axis text size

property.name: GridBackgroundColor
property.comment: Sets the color for the background of the chart-drawing area (everything behind the grid lines).

property.name: DrawGraphValues
property.comment: Draw or don't draw values on the graph.

property.name: ScatterShape
property.comment: sets the shape of the scatter graphs Can be CIRCLE, SQUARE, TRIANGLE, CROSS

property.name: MarkerToUse
property.comment: Set the marker (image)to be used. An int value from 1 to 4 See the res/drawable and res/layout folders of the B4A project

property.name: LegendEntrySpace
property.comment: sets the space between the legend entries on a horizontal axis in pixels, converts to dp internally Default value is 6.0f

property.name: DrawGridBackground
property.comment: set this to true to draw the grid background, false if not

property.name: XaxisTextColor
property.comment: set X-Axis text color

property.name: XaxisLables
property.comment: Set the X-Axis labels.

property.name: BorderWidth
property.comment: Sets the width of the border lines in dp.

property.name: XaxisLabelPosition
property.comment: set x-axis label position

property.name: DrawYaxisGridLines
property.comment: set draw y-axis grid lines

property.name: ShowYaxisRightLabels
property.comment: Show or don't show the right Y-Axis labels.

property.name: DrawAxisLine
property.comment: set draw x-axis line

property.name: ChartBitmap
property.comment: Returns the bitmap that represents the chart.

property.name: FillColor
property.comment: Set the color to fill the area between the graph and the X axis with.

property.name: ScaleEnabled
property.comment: Set this to true to enable scaling (zooming in and out by gesture) for the chart (this does not effect dragging) on both X- and Y-Axis.

property.name: PinchZoom
property.comment: if set to true, both x and y axis can be scaled with 2 fingers, if false, x and y axis can be scaled separately. default: false

property.name: ScatterShapeSize
property.comment: sets the size of the scatter shapes

class.name: mpandroidchartwrapper.pieChartWrapper
class.event: value_selected(index As Int, value As Float)

method.name: onChartScale
method.comment: Callbacks when the chart is scaled / zoomed via pinch zoom gesture. me: scaleX: scalefactor on the x-axis scaleY: scalefactor on the y-axis

method.name: onChartSingleTapped
method.comment: Callbacks when the chart is single-tapped. me:

method.name: isHoleTransparent
method.comment: Returns true if the hole in the center of the PieChart is transparent, false if not. Return type: @return:true if hole is transparent.

method.name: onChartTranslate
method.comment: Callbacks when the chart is moved / translated via drag gesture. me: dX: translation distance on the x-axis dY: translation distance on the y-axis

method.name: onChartLongPressed
method.comment: Callbacks when the chart is longpressed. me:

method.name: isDrawCenterTextEnabled
method.comment: returns true if drawing the center text is enabled Return type: @return:

method.name: isDrawSliceTextEnabled
method.comment: returns true if drawing x-values is enabled, false if not Return type: @return:

method.name: saveToPath
method.comment:
Saves the current chart state with the given name to the given path on the sdcard leaving the path empty "" will put the saved file directly on the SD card chart is saved as a PNG image, example: saveToPath("myfilename", "foldername1/foldername2");
fileName e.g. "my_image" pathOnSD e.g. "folder1/folder2/folder3"

method.name: clearValues
method.comment: Clears this data object from all DataSets and removes all Entries. Don't forget to invalidate the chart after this.

method.name: isDrawHoleEnabled
method.comment: returns true if the hole in the center of the pie-chart is set to be visible, false if not Return type: @return:

method.name: isDrawRoundedSlicesEnabled
method.comment: Returns true if the chart is set to draw each end of a pie-slice "rounded". Return type: @return:

method.name: isCenterTextWordWrapEnabled
method.comment: should the center text be word wrapped? note that word wrapping takes a toll on performance if word wrapping is disabled, newlines are still respected

method.name: isUsePercentValuesEnabled
method.comment: Returns true if using percentage values is enabled for the chart. Return type: @return:

method.name: saveToGallery
method.comment:
Saves the current state of the chart to the gallery as a JPEG image. The filename and compression can be set. 0 == maximum compression, 100 = low compression (high quality). NOTE: Needs permission WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
fileName e.g. "my_image" quality e.g. 50, min = 0, max = 100

method.name: onChartFling
method.comment: Callbacks then a fling gesture is made on the chart. me1: me2: velocityX: velocityY:

property.name: UsePercentValues
property.comment: If this is enabled, values inside the PieChart are drawn in percent and not with their original value. Values provided for the ValueFormatter to format are then provided in percent.

property.name: HoleRadius
property.comment: Returns the size of the hole radius in percent of the total radius.

property.name: CenterTextSize
property.comment: Sets the size of the center text of the PieChart in dp.

property.name: DrawCenterText
property.comment: set this to true to draw the text that is displayed in the center of the pie chart

property.name: CenterTextSizePixels
property.comment: Sets the size of the center text of the PieChart in pixels.

property.name: CenterText
property.comment: returns the text that is drawn in the center of the pie-chart

property.name: ChartBitmap
property.comment: Returns the bitmap that represents the chart.

property.name: HoleColor
property.comment: Sets the color for the hole that is drawn in the center of the PieChart (if enabled). NOTE: Use setHoleColorTransparent(boolean enabled) to make the hole transparent.

property.name: DrawSliceText
property.comment: set this to true to draw the x-value text into the pie slices

property.name: HoleColorTransparent
property.comment: Set the hole in the center of the PieChart transparent. Thank you, code provided by:

property.name: TransparentCircleRadius
property.comment: sets the radius of the transparent circle that is drawn next to the hole in the piechart in percent of the maximum radius (max = the radius of the whole chart), default 55% -> means 5% larger than the center-hole by default

property.name: CenterTextWordWrapEnabled
property.comment: should the center text be word wrapped? note that word wrapping takes a toll on performance if word wrapping is disabled, newlines are still respected

property.name: TransparentCircleColor
property.comment: Sets the color the transparent-circle should have.

property.name: TransparentCircleAlpha
property.comment: Sets the amount of transparency the transparent circle should have 0 = fully transparent, 255 = fully opaque. Default value is 100.

property.name: DrawHoleEnabled
property.comment: set this to true to draw the pie center empty

property.name: CenterTextColor
property.comment: Sets the color of the center text of the PieChart.

property.name: CenterTextRadiusPercent
property.comment: the rectangular radius of the bounding box for the center text, as a percentage of the pie hole default 1.f (100%)

property.name: ShowCrossHair

property.comment: Sets the width of the highlight line in dp.

property.comment: set X-Axis text size

property.comment: Set the minimum value for the y axis If a value is not set then it will be calculated automatically

property.comment: set Y-Axis text size

property.name: DrawFilled
property.comment: Fill or don't fill the area between the graph and the X axis.

property.name: GraphLineColor
property.comment: Set the color to fill the area between the graph and the X axis with.

property.name: DrawGraphValues
property.comment: Draw or don't draw values on the graph.

property.comment: Set the marker (image)to be used. An int value from 1 to 4 See the res/drawable and res/layout folders of the B4A project

property.comment: Set the X-Axis labels.

property.name: GraphValueDigits
property.comment: set the number of insignificant digits to appear in the graph values

property.name: GraphLineWidth
property.comment: Set the width of the graph line.

property.name: LegendVisible
